data.title: Studio 7 Esthetics
data.text:
​

​

Consultation: $50

If you just want to chat and decide the best direction for you, this is a great way to lead you in the proper journey for total skin health. We have the time to build what is necessary.

​

Corrective Facials

Corrective Facial - $105

As experts in our industry, we feel you can identify what your skin concerns are, but it is our job to tailor your facial to what your skin needs for that corrective treatment. This facial encompasses any corrective facial ( Acne - All Grades, Rosacea, Melasma, Aging Concerns, Hyperpigmentation, Microbiome Balance/Normal and Dry/Dehydrated) concerns and addresses these on a professional and educational scale.

​

Custom Facial Level I - $139 (Plan - Have to book monthly)

This is the most comprehensive facial designed for clients who value continued care based on professional findings determined by skin analysis and consultation, modality expertise, authentic aging practice proficiency and understanding. This facial leads to your next facial experience...building on what is needed. Weather it is a dermaplane, microdermabrasion, peel, whatever we feel is best protocol, is incorporated into this plan. We are "your esthetician" who takes your barrier seriously!!

​

Custom Facial Level II - $159 (Plan - Have to book monthly)

This leveled facial adds other, more advanced modalities into the equation or plan! We continue building on the individual skin care plan, incorporating more services that are designed to up your skincare journey. It's important to have that person vested in your skin...who has taken the time to get to know how it responds, what devices work best and how often each are needed, in your camp!

​

Custom Facial Level III - $179 (Coming 2024)

​

Complete Relaxation Facial - $95

This facial is designed to provide a thorough face, neck and décolletage cleansing while incorporating beautiful botanicals, colloidal silver and gold, skin elasticity enhancing peptides and a gua sha twist. We will include a face massage, mask and your choice of neck or hand/arm massage.

​

HydroPeel- Facial $195 (Hydro Facial combined with a Chemical Peel)

This service combines hydration with chemical exfoliation, targeting skin dryness at its root. "A revitalized complexion with reduced inflammation, backed by proven efficacy of AHA's in enhancing skin hydration and texture."

Back TREATMENTS facials - add $10

* Corrective Back Treatment: This treatment addresses any concerns you have related to the back area. This may include acne, dryness/dehydration, general cleanse and microbiome conditioning. This also includes and exfoliation, mask and massage.

*Back Enzymatic Treatment: This treatment refreshes and revives the body + mind. It is designed to smooth texture, stimulate cell renewal and prevent breakouts. Allow this experience to balance energy while leaving the skin feeling silky smooth and healthy through targeted treatments and relaxing massages.

​

Dermaplane - $55

Oil Plane - (Less Trauma CBD oil) - $65

Dermaplane can exfoliate skin by getting rid of the dry surface layer of the epidermis and vellus hair

​

Microdermabrasion - $65

Diamondhead crystal tips gently sand the skin, removing the thicker, uneven outer layer.

​

LED Light Session - $55

Add Red, Blue or Amber light for ant-aging/inflammation, acne management and/or collagen and elastin building.

​

High Frequency - $55

Treats and prevents stubborn acne and encourages inner skin health - enriched oxygen molecules are produced that create anti-bacterial action and a "natural" thermal effect.

​

Carboxy Mask - $65

The BOHR effect, CO2 dehydration increases bloodflow, providing nutrients and oxygen to deeper layers.

​

PRENATAL "Belly" Facials:

(cleanse, exfoliate, mask and moisturize)

​

PRENATAL "belly" facial - $119

Our Mom's to be need extra pampering and care. This Belly only facial gives that itchy and over-compromised skin some reprieve! Our safe for Mom and Baby line drenches your stomach with that HEALTHY HARMONY!

​

PRENATAL "face and belly" facial - $139

This combo adds a traditional facial with a belly facial. This dynamic duo takes that pampering to the next level. Hormones can cause a variety of skin changes, so addressing this allows our Mommies that well deserved pampering.

​

​

vajacial

​

Exfoliating Vajacial - $65

Purify, hydrate, and brighten problematic skin. This luxurious service treats ingrown hairs, bumpy and acne-prone skin, fades and prevents hyperpigmentation, soothes irritated skin, and increases moisture levels.

​

​

ORGANIC FACIALS:

(holistic and wellness facials)

​

GUA SHA facial - $119

The Gua Sha experience is a jaw-dropping service that will manipulate that underlying muscular and facial tissue that will assist with lymph drainage and blood circulation. Understanding the importance of facial stimulation and making sure the "stream" doesn't become stagnant is key to youthful and glow skin!

​

LYMPH drainage facial - $125

Lymph becomes stagnant and holds onto toxins and excess fluid causing an unhealthy environment needing assistance. Since our lymph system is a pump system, it only flows one direction. Without proper drainage and detoxification, we see sallow or grey skin, puffy eyes and jowls as well as experiencing toxin retention.

​

Peels

HEALING PEELS THAT ARE DESIGNED ACCORDING TO YOUR SKIN...NOT A "One Fits All"

​

​

Based on your GPA, Fitzpatrick Scale and Peel experience, we will start to resurface your skin and create a healthy micro- biome for a better skin result.

​

Healing Peel Service - $125+

Our Peels begin with advanced peels and treatment solutions for the best clinically corrective results.

​

Enzyme Resurfacing Service - $90

Uniquely formulated pumpkin enzymes are infused with retinol while super-rich pomegranate and mango antioxidants that fight free radicals.

​

Pure Peel Service - $155 (Suggested protocol 3 Treatments - Bundle these for $350).

This peel is a revolutionary peel that not only has minimal to no down time for the client, but also creates a next day glass skin glow not offered with any other peel!

​

3D Smart Peel Series -$325

Peel series CORRECTS with the first peel, BRIGHTENS with the second peel and HYDRATES WITH THE 3RD AND FINAL PEEL!

​

EXCLUSIVE: peel BOOT CAMP! -$400

This is the most effective skin peel series. Highly suggested for resurfacing. We gage the series on time- of -season and client downtime. *Typically down time is 3-5 day.

EXTRA EXTRA READ ALL ABOUT IT!!

SALT ROOM: Temporarily Closed

SESSION: $35

10 Session Salt Room Punch Card - $280

​

INFRARED SAUNA

SESSION: $30

5 Session Salt Room Punch Card - $135

10 Session Salt Room Punch Card - $250

​

COLD PLUNGE

SESSION: MONTHLY PLAN

$75: Monthly Pass

MAT- MUSCLE ACTIVATION TECHNIQUE

ASSESMENT: $25

Services starting at - $125

​

sugar hair removal services

Sugaring is a form of Epilation, which is hair removal directly at the root. Epilation allows clients to be smooth for a longer period of time because a new hair bulb must grow. It is different than when Depilation is performed and hair simply is cut off at the skin's surface.

Sugaring is performed with a mixture of Sugar, Water, and Lemon Juice and is applied onto the skin against the direction of the hair's growth, and pulled off the skin with the hair's natural growth pattern. In performing the application and removal process this way, excess irritation is prevented, and the risk of ingrown hairs from breakage is diminished.
